page.title: 06RECREATION INFANTS
page.content: A class of 5 and 6 year old children went to the park.They saw the swings and roundabouts.The swings were different sizes.There was a slide for the bigger boys and girls.Ther are seats and 22trees.There is a climbing frame and football posts. A class of 6 and 7 year old children carried out asurvey of their own leisure activities.The favourite activity was watching Television or Videos. Every child owned a bicycle and enjoyed playing with friends. All children attended the sports centre once a week for swimming and/or gymnastics. The boys played football and make believe games,the girls preferred reading.
